techmeme.title: In the past few weeks, the Trump administration replaced the CIOs of the OMB, OPM, and Department of Energy with Elon Musk- and Peter Thiel-aligned executives (Makena Kelly/Wired)
Google CEO Sundar Pichai says quantum computers that are "practically useful" are five to 10 years away, and quantum "reminds me of where AI was in the 2010s" (Marissa Newman/Bloomberg)
DOGE accessing Treasury systems and classified data breaks a fundamental security principle and could help the US' adversaries steal data and install backdoors (Foreign Policy)
Apple partners with Brigham and Women's Hospital to launch a voluntary, virtual five-year Apple Health Study in its Research app, open to iPhone users in the US (Caroline Igo/CNET)
Adobe launches Generate Video in public beta via its re-designed Firefly web app, alongside new image generation, translation, and AI credit subscription tiers (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
